alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 25 at 9:56PM EST until December 26 at 5:17AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Merrimack and Belknap Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Suncook River at North Chichester. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Flooding occurs at several camp sites at the Lazy River Campground. At 9.0 feet, Flooding occurs at about 20 camp sites at the Lazy River Campground. Flooding also begins at the Epsom Valley Campground. At 10.0 feet, The lower section of the Lazy River Campground floods. Two campsites at the Epsom Valley Campground flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM EST Sunday the stage was 7.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 PM EST Sunday was 9.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 4.3 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
